name: Aptic
description:
Install instructions

For Windows
1.  Download the game
2.  Open file explorer and find the downloaded file
3.  Extract the file
4.  open the new folder
5.  Start the exe file
Done
________________________________________________________

For Android
1 . Download the game
2.  Open a file explorer (Recommended: Zarchiver)
3.  Find the file
4.  Extract
5.  open the new folder
6.  start the apk file
Done
